tweet: In our view, #IOTA is up there with #ADA in terms of the quality of the dev team and commitment to their vision. IOTA is much more ambitious which may be detrimental to their success. Cardano is more pragmatic in working with existing blockchain-based systems. What’s your take?

First up is IOHK CEO, Charles Hoskinson delivering his keynote speech, "State of the nation", where he will share the latest update on IOHK’s goals, products and the vision for Cardano 2020. #IOHKSummit2019 #cryptocurrency #blockchaintechnology  https://t.co/hQyimW8KTY

Are you all ready to come join and watch the livestream tomorrow of Charles' Keynote speech at 9a.m. EDT, in Miami?  We are! For those interested, the livestream link can be found here  https://t.co/ldMBM5LNgc #IOHKSummit2019 #blockchain #cryptocurrency

CEO of IOHK, Charles Hoskinson, starts off the Summit with a keynote speech about Cardano 2020. #Cardano2020 If you're watching on the livestream, you could win a Tangem card! Details here:  https://t.co/7PzEurcEVc

Next up is Bruce Fenton, CEO and founder of Atlantic Financial Blockchain Labs. Bruce will be talking about the future of digital securities in the context of the blockchain and cryptocurrency industries. #IOHKSummit2019 #blockchaintech #digitalcurrency  https://t.co/hJMnDwRnVc

Cardano ambassadors and community members, Markus Gufler and Robert Kornacki, are up on stage demonstrating how a full Cardano node can run on low-cost open source hardware, using less than ten watts of power! #IOHKSummit2019  #CardanoCommunity  https://t.co/af4YH2jH9J
